1 Part1: Don’t Repeat Yourself

1.1 Version control with Git

1.1.1 Git superbasics

git init      # 初始化
git status    # 查看状态
git add <filename> # 将文件的更改添加到commit
git add .          # 将所有文件的更改添加到commit

git commit -m <message>  # 提交更改和信息
git stash                # 隐藏某次更改
git log                  # 查看commit的记录
git revert <hash>        # 退回到某次commit

1.1.2 Git and Github

建立和github的连接

1.2 Collaborating using Trunk-based development

1.2.1 TBD basics

git clone <ssh>  # 克隆仓库到本地
git checkout -b <branch name> # 建立新的分支
git checkout <branch name>    # 切换到分支
git push origin <branch name> #  推送分支，然后再GitHub创建pull request

1.2.2 Handling conflicts

1.2.3 Make sure you blame the right person

git blame <file name>   # 查看文件的更改记录

1.3 Literate programming

1.3.1 Keeping it DRY

1.3.1.1 Generating R Markdown code from code

可以使用knitr::knit_child()批量生成文章内容。

比如，想要针对palmerpenguins::penguins数据写一篇分析报告，文章一共三个章节，每个章节都包括一个bill_length_mm和body_mass_g的散点图，以及回归方程的表格，将以下内容写入child.qmd中

##### Species: `r x`
```{r eval=TRUE}
df <- dt_penguins %>% 
  filter(species == x) %>% 
  drop_na()

df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, body_mass_g, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE) +
  ggtitle(str_glue("Species: {x}"))
```

```{r eval=TRUE}
mod_lm <- lm(body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm*sex, data = df)
gtsummary::tbl_regression(mod_lm)
```
library(tidyverse)
dt_penguins <- palmerpenguins::penguins 
species <- unique(dt_penguins$species)
res <- map(species,
     \(x) knitr::knit_child("child/child.qmd",
                            envir = environment(),
                            quiet = TRUE))
cat(unlist(res))
1.3.1.1.1 Species: Adelie
df <- dt_penguins %>% 
  filter(species == x) %>% 
  drop_na()

df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, body_mass_g, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE) +
  ggtitle(str_glue("Species: {x}"))
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
mod_lm <- lm(body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm*sex, data = df)
gtsummary::tbl_regression(mod_lm)
Characteristic Beta 95% CI1 p-value
bill_length_mm 23 -13, 58 0.2
sex


    female — —
    male 160 -1,664, 1,984 0.9
bill_length_mm * sex


    bill_length_mm * male 11 -36, 58 0.6
1 CI = Confidence Interval
1.3.1.1.2 Species: Gentoo
df <- dt_penguins %>% 
  filter(species == x) %>% 
  drop_na()

df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, body_mass_g, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE) +
  ggtitle(str_glue("Species: {x}"))
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
mod_lm <- lm(body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm*sex, data = df)
gtsummary::tbl_regression(mod_lm)
Characteristic Beta 95% CI1 p-value
bill_length_mm 37 1.2, 73 0.043
sex


    female — —
    male 277 -1,830, 2,385 0.8
bill_length_mm * sex


    bill_length_mm * male 7.7 -37, 53 0.7
1 CI = Confidence Interval
1.3.1.1.3 Species: Chinstrap
df <- dt_penguins %>% 
  filter(species == x) %>% 
  drop_na()

df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, body_mass_g, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE) +
  ggtitle(str_glue("Species: {x}"))
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
mod_lm <- lm(body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm*sex, data = df)
gtsummary::tbl_regression(mod_lm)
Characteristic Beta 95% CI1 p-value
bill_length_mm 25 -11, 61 0.2
sex


    female — —
    male -1,228 -5,233, 2,777 0.5
bill_length_mm * sex


    bill_length_mm * male 30 -50, 110 0.5
1 CI = Confidence Interval

# Part1: Don’t Repeat Yourself

## Version control with Git

### Git superbasics

```{r}
git init      # 初始化
git status    # 查看状态
git add <filename> # 将文件的更改添加到commit
git add .          # 将所有文件的更改添加到commit

git commit -m <message>  # 提交更改和信息
git stash                # 隐藏某次更改
git log                  # 查看commit的记录
git revert <hash>        # 退回到某次commit
```


### Git and Github

[建立和github的连接](https://raps-with-r.dev/git.html#git-and-github)


## Collaborating using Trunk-based development

### TBD basics

```{r}
git clone <ssh>  # 克隆仓库到本地
git checkout -b <branch name> # 建立新的分支
git checkout <branch name>    # 切换到分支
git push origin <branch name> #  推送分支，然后再GitHub创建pull request

```

### Handling conflicts

![](github_conflict_tbd.png)


### Make sure you blame the right person

```{r}
git blame <file name>   # 查看文件的更改记录
```


## Literate programming

### Keeping it DRY

#### Generating R Markdown code from code

可以使用`knitr::knit_child()`批量生成文章内容。


```{r eval=TRUE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
dt_penguins <- palmerpenguins::penguins 
species <- unique(dt_penguins$species)
```

比如，想要针对`palmerpenguins::penguins`数据写一篇分析报告，文章一共三个章节，每个章节都包括一个`bill_length_mm`和`body_mass_g`的散点图，以及回归方程的表格，将以下内容写入`child.qmd`中

`````{verbatim}
##### Species: `r x`
```{r eval=TRUE}
df <- dt_penguins %>% 
  filter(species == x) %>% 
  drop_na()

df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, body_mass_g, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE) +
  ggtitle(str_glue("Species: {x}"))
```

```{r eval=TRUE}
mod_lm <- lm(body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm*sex, data = df)
gtsummary::tbl_regression(mod_lm)
```
`````


然后运行下面的代码（直接运行该代码框会报错，需要knit/render整个文档），就能生成章节：


```{r eval=TRUE, results='asis'}
res <- map(species,
     \(x) knitr::knit_child("child/child.qmd",
                            envir = environment(),
                            quiet = TRUE))
cat(unlist(res))
```


parametrized reports 也是类似的道理。
